Integral

These are some examples: \(\int{x^2} = 2x\)

\[x^2 \over y\]

Derivative

$\dot x^2 = 2x$

For Loop to Find Odd and Even Numbers

Code Bellow

for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++){
  if(i % 2 = 0){
  console.log("even");
  } else {
  console.log("odd")
  }
}

Quadratic Formula

The quadratic formula is as follows: \(x = \over 2a}\)

  • The x represents the soloutions on the x-intecepts the other variables are from the definition of a quadratic equation. Give bellow: \(ax^2 + bx + c\)
